name: QR-Maker
description: A Software as a Service (SaaS) product where anyone can create a personal site (like a restaurant menu), generate QR-Codes, print them and access the created site as a read-only version for customers.

name: Portfolio
description: A react project to present my experience and work as a portfolio in a clear and nice presentation. All designs and styles are custom-made without any library, but highly inspired by Brittany Chang.

name: pmOne Share
description: pmOne Share is a web app that creates tile-based dashboards, reporting- and corporate portals. pmOne Share makes it possible to build departmental and corporate solutions independently and in a manner appropriate to the needs. pmOne believes in close-source solutions.

name: Patrick Visuals
description: Patrick Visuals is my company for photo and videography. In July 2019 I started this business besides my full-time job. Most of the jobs are related to weddings and product photography.

name: Burger Builder
description: A react project to build some basic burgers and store them in a firebase realtime database. This project is part of a ReactJS online course.

name: pmOne XPCT
description: pmOne XPCT is a web app that enables customers to forecast and simulate differnt drivers on their financial state. The product was discontinued in 2018.

name: Podify
description: A Angular and NodeJS project where users can simply convert written text into an embeddable audio file. The Text-To-Speech API and Storage Bucket is provided by Google.

name: Personal Blog
description: My personal blog runs on Ghost CMS. The most articles are heavily tech related and generates a couple of thousands visits per month.
